messages.subject: FLAG PICS FOUND!
messages.msgSnippet: http://home.att.ne.jp/sky/josekine/kurirukaakira21911.jpg AIZU banner-- with a man next to it so you can get a good idea of the relative size.
messages.messageBody:
http://home.att.ne.jp/sky/josekine/kurirukaakira21911.jpg

AIZU banner-- with a man next to it so you can get a good idea of the
relative size.


http://www.bekkoame.ne.jp/~hera/kotoni/reppan.JPG

Northern Confederation (post-Toba Fushimi) banner-- same proportions.

I *believe* the Shinsengumi banner was the same size with the same size
flagpole, although Serizawa Kamo-san's site says the banner was a whopping
1.8 by 1.8 meters (taken from Nagakura's account).

--M.
